mapper.insert:
SELECT 'auction'||lpad(seq_auc.nextval, 3, 0) FROM dual
INSERT INTO AUCTION (ano, uno, acontent, initprice, priceunit) VALUES (#{ano},#{uno},#{acontent}, #{initprice}, #{priceunit})

select.if: SELECT * FROM AUCTION WHERE UNO = #{keyword} order by ANO DESC
SELECT * FROM AUCTION WHERE ANO in (select distinct bno from hashtag where htagcom = #{keyword}) order by ANO DESC
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE UNO = #{keyword} order by ANO DESC
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BNO in (select distinct bno from hashtag where htagcom = #{keyword}) order by BNO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_password, member_phone FROM joinmember where member_no=#{member_no}

select b.member_name username1, c.member_name username2, a.eventtime, decode(eventtype, '1', '친구 요청을 하셨습니다.', '2', '친구 요청을 거절하셨습니다.', '3', '메세지를 보내셨습니다.') as eventtype from Event a, joinmember b, joinmember c where a.userno2 = b.member_no and #{userno1} = c.member_no
select a.bno, c.member_no, c.member_name, a.bcontent, a.attachfile, b.pdic from board a, picture b, joinmember c where a.attachfile = b.pno and c.member_no = a.uno and a.bno = #{bno:INTEGER}
select a.member_name, b.Ccontent, b.writedate, b.postno from joinmember a, comments b, board c where a.member_no = b.uno and c.BNO = b.POSTNO and b.postno = #{postno:INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE joinmember SET member_name = #{member_name}, member_birth = #{member_birth}, member_sex=#{member_sex}, member_email=#{member_email}, member_phone=#{member_phone}, member_join=#{member_join}, member_privacy=#{member_privacy} WHERE member_no = #{member_no:INTEGER}
UPDATE joinmember SET member_id = #{member_id}, member_password= #{member_password}, member_phone=#{member_phone} WHERE member_no = #{member_no:INTEGER}
